'''Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Search in the Algae Sea (Quest)}}.

It replaces [[Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz]] and during {{Quest|Waking from the Great Dream (Quest)}} is itself replaced by [[Sword of Narzissenkreuz (Quest)|Sword of Narzissenkreuz]].
